description.narrative: By end 2021, national, regional and local authorities have the necessary capacity to develop strategic and operational nutrition plans and strategies and to plan, budget and coordinate nutrition interventions utilizing a human-rights based approach

sector.narrative: Data, research, evaluation, evidence generation, synthesis, and use for prevention of stunting and other forms of malnutrition
National multisectoral strategies and plans to prevent stunting (excludes intervention-specific strategies)
Technical assistance - Prevention of stunting and other forms of malnutrition

title.narrative: Chad Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Survival and Early Development)
Chad United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By end 2021, national, regional and local authorities have the necessary capacity to develop strategic and operational nutrition plans and strategies and to plan, budget and coordinate nutrition interventions utilizing a human-rights based approach

description.narrative: Capacity building of 1,747 health professionals at different levels of the health system (central, regional and peripheral), joint missions, daily support by UNICEF programme managers and national and international consultants, have together resulted in the health system having a critical mass of human resources capable of planning and ensuring the management of nutritional programmes. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:09/02/2020

title.narrative: Nombre de Comites provinciaux de nutrition et d'alimentation (CPNA) ayant un plan de travail annuel
Country has a budgeted plan to eliminate water and fluids to support increase in exclusive breastfeeding
Country has a budgeted plan to improve dietary diversity
Le guide d'orientation de la lutte contre les carences en micronutritment est valid/adopt
